definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
present the facts and reason things out
pinyin: bai3 shi4 shi2 jiang3 dao4 li3

sentences.english: Beauty is truth's smile when she look ins her own fgenius in a particular excellent mirror.
sentences.chinese: 美即是道理的含笑，当她在完整的镜子前揽镜自照。

sentences.english: Their intrusion into our private lives is unwarrantable .
sentences.chinese: 他们侵扰我们的私生活是毫无道理的。

sentences.english: Reasoning does not seem to work with them.
sentences.chinese: 跟他们讲道理似乎不管用。

sentences.english: And Callicles did have a point.
sentences.chinese: 卡里克利斯说得确有道理。

sentences.english: America has legitimate beefs with China, but this bill is the wrong way to address them.
sentences.chinese: 美国这么做有它的道理，但此法案却并不能解决问题。

sentences.english: Even though you are fairily beautiful you need to be logical with others.
sentences.chinese: 即使你美若天仙，做什么事情还是要讲道理的。

sentences.english: There is a lesson in all of this, but I am not sure what.
sentences.chinese: 这其中蕴含着一个道理，但我还不确信那是什么。

sentences.english: This matter overturned all reasons that I learned on Sunday in the school.
sentences.chinese: 这件事把我从周日学校学到的所有道理都颠覆了。

sentences.english: He is wise that hath wit enough for hellos own affairs.
sentences.chinese: 懂事情的道理者有足够的机智措置惩罚本身的工作。

sentences.english: Theory is the grey market clincher.
sentences.chinese: 理论是灰色的，市场才是硬道理。

sentences.english: Cimmaron . This ski run has a giant slalom feel to it with good reason.
sentences.chinese: 这个滑雪场运行有大回转的感觉是很有道理的。

sentences.english: A recent experience re-taught me this truth.
sentences.chinese: 最近自己的一个经历又令我悟出了这其中的道理。

sentences.english: This is the truth that this hunchbacked old man has taught us.
sentences.chinese: 这就是这位驼背老人告诉我们的道理。

sentences.english: There's no reason Nepal should be a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 没道理尼泊尔应该做傀儡。

sentences.english: Be opinionated about themselves do not understand.
sentences.chinese: 自以为是的说着自己都不懂的道理。

definition: idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
easy to grasp but difficult to put into practice (idiom)/easier said than done
as the proverb says/as they say...
